name: Zemingo
description:
Zemingo is a premier mobile and web design and development agency leading the emerging field of Consumer IoT (CIoT). We work with enterprises and emerging startups to deliver world-class digital products, turn devices into smart, connected devices and drive digital transformation. 
We design and develop our products to abide by HIPAA and GDPR compliance regulations.
Capabilities: UX/UI Design, Swift, Java, AngularJS, Node.js.
 
Our services / Design
 
Zemingo's digital studio specializes in brand and user experience. Our creative approach is driven by our curiosity. Every project has a unique story and cultural context of its own. We're eager to learn our clients' stories, collaborate with them, and help them share their passion projects in a clear and engaging way, exciting their audience and helping them maintain long-lasting relationships. 
Our services / Development
Zemingo’s main driving force is its software engineering unit, specializing in mobile, web & cloud projects, including development for iOS & Android OS, as well as server-side, web and cloud. Our R&D process includes technical product specification, system architecture, code design, QA, and stabilization. Every project developed by Zemingo is accompanied by an experienced project manager, using agile methodology.
